title: Run "Offertory" trading game to get trading volume up
body:
Should we introduce a new lottery style game to drive up buy volume? There is no risk to players since everyone can get their deposited PROPHET back after the game ends (they just lose the interest). If it works and community likes, we can start automating this with smart contracts.  

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1e1kqUfZdX6Q-fTxQi2DWEd0a2M1F20Q0wWvGw5w3jvY/edit?usp=sharing
author: 0xcA670BC7D254C2a4b050Dbb05aD8f3db57Fd43Cd
